backlog.request: Update ERD diagrams and documentation for team-agnostic activities
backlog.reason: Activities table was made team-agnostic in BE-016 implementation - no longer has direct teamId/teamGoalId references
backlog.value: Ensures architectural documentation accurately reflects current schema design decisions

changes: Activity model no longer has teamId or teamGoalId fields
Activities are linked to teams only through User -> TeamMember -> Team relationship
New TeamProgress model tracks aggregate progress separately
Activity timestamp simplified from startTime/endTime to single timestamp field
tasks: Update ERD diagram to remove direct Activity-Team relationships
Update core-entities.md to reflect team-agnostic design
Document the architectural decision for team-agnostic activities
Update data-access-patterns.md with new query patterns
Ensure all diagrams show correct relationship paths
